stages.logText: I entered a classroom in Brimhaven's school. The teacher told me to sit down.
I noticed an evil-looking statue in a corner. Who on earth puts such an ugly, hideous thing in a school?
I found a free place next to a student named Golin.
The teacher was droning endlessly about Brimhaven history.
Then a practice lesson started.
Everyone should take a set of practice weapons from the chest and sit down again.
I should look for a dueling partner.
I started a fight with Golin.
I started a fight with Golin and killed him.
I started a fight with Golin, but I broke off the duel. Very good.
I tried to fight a pupil, but they all ran away screaming.
I started a fight with the teacher.
I started a fight with the teacher and killed her.
I started a fight with the teacher, but I broke off the duel. Very good.
I feel the evil stare of the statue.
The evil grinning statue suddenly grew to an incredible size and attacked me!
I killed the evil statue.
The teacher thanked me for saving her. School is over for me. I can go to the general store and get a cake for good performance.
I cheated during the duel. The teacher noticed it and banned me from the school.
The teacher was very satisfied with my performance in the duel. School is over for me. I can go to the general store and get a cake for good performance.
The teacher sent me away, because I killed Golin in the duel.
Golin was horrified by my murder of the teacher and attacked me to avenge her.
Facutloni asked me to help him check the storage. I should check if there is a pair of every item.
I have found a pair of crystal globes.
I have found a pair of plush pillows.
I have found a pair of lyras.
I have found a pair of boots.
I have found a pair of chandeliers.
I have found a pair of mysterious green somethings.
I have found a pair of old, worn capes.
I have found a pair of pretty porcelain figures.
I have found a pair of striped hammers.
I have found a pair of dusty old books.
I found all the 10 pairs. Facutloni is very happy.
